ðŸ“– Summary: Wazuh is an open-source security platform that provides XDR and SIEM capabilities. It uses agents to collect data from endpoints, which is then analyzed by a central server. Wazuh integrates with the Elastic Stack for data visualization and offers features like intrusion detection, log analysis, file integrity monitoring, vulnerability detection, configuration assessment, and incident response.
